name: Cascade Falls
description:
Cascade Falls is a simple game where you play as a sword fish going up the waterfall dodging rocks and collecting fishes to block rocks.

This is Game Jam game I made for the Mini Jam 104: Cascade with the limitation of Finite Quantity.

My game follows the theme of Cascade with the concept by going up a waterfall.

It follows the limitation of Finite Quantity by having a finite quantity of health with you being able to pick up fishes along the way to increases it.

Thanks for playing!
